column2: "Dza ɔfa Ammonmba ho. Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Aso Israel nnyi mbabanyin? Aso onnyi owuodzi? Afei ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na Malkam enya Gad
column3: na no nkorɔfo tsenatsena no nkurow mu yi?"
hwɛ
column6: mebɛma wɔatse ɔko na esebɔ ndze etsia Rabaa a ɔyɛ Ammonmba dze no; na ɔbɛdan amamfo isiw
column7: na wɔdze ogya ahyew ne mbabaa; nna Israel bɛpam hɔn a wɔpaam no no

column3: bɔ mbubuw
column6: hom mfura eyitam: hom ntwa sukwadwom
column7: na hom ndzi akɔnaaba wɔ mban mu; na Milkɔm bɔkɔ ndɔmmum

column3: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ehyehyɛ woho wɔ w’ahoɔdzen mu
column4: w’ahoɔdzen a ɔrokɔ famu no mu? Ɔwo a edze wo werɛ hyɛɛ w’egyapadze mu

column3: medze hu fi hɔn a woetwa wo ho ehyia nyina nkyɛn mebɛba wo do
column5: dɔm EWURADZE na ɔse; na wɔbɔbɔ hom apetse
column6: hom mu nyimpa biara akɔ n’enyim
column7: a obiara nnkɔboaboa eguamfo no ano."

column2: "Na n’ekyir no medze Ammonmba no befi ndɔmmum asan aba
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Edom dze. Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Aso nyansa nnyi Teman bio? Aso apam ahera abadwembafo? Aso hɔn nyansaa etu ayew?"

column3: hom nsan ekyir
column5: Ao Dedanfo! Na medze Esau no mbusu mebɛba no do ber a medze n’asotwe bɛba no do no!"

column2: "Sɛ wenyin abatsewfo mpo na wɔbaa wo do a
column3: aso nkyɛ wonnkegya wenyinaba mpɛpɛw bi? Sɛ ewifo baa anadwe a
column4: nkyɛ hɔn mpo wɔnnkɛsɛɛ ara ekodu dza ɔbɔso hɔn?"

column3: mama Esau no ho ada hɔ
column4: mama no sumabea ada edzi; na orunntum nnsuma noho. N’asefo asɛɛ

column3: mobɔkora hɔn do enyikan; na ma w’ekunafo mfa hɔn werɛ ntwer me."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Hwɛ
column3: sɛ hɔn a wɔmmfata dɛ wɔbɔnom kɔɔpow no mu no mpo wɔbɔnom ara ampa a; nna aso ɔwo na ebɛfa woho edzi sɔnn? Ennkɛfa woho edzi sɔnn
EWURADZE na ɔse
column8: na no nkurow nyinara bɛyɛ amamfo daa."

column3: na wɔasoma ahembɔfo wɔ amanaman mu
hwɛ
column5: na adasa mu nyia woebu no enyimtsia."

column3: w’akoma ne ntsɛn adaadaa wo
column4: ɔwo a etse ɔbotan ne mpaapaae mu
column5: ɔwo a akoko a ɔkrɔn kitsa wo nsamu: kaansa eyɛ wo buw wɔ ɔsorsor dɛ ɔkɔr mpo a
column6: medze wo befi hɔ esi famu

column2: "Na Edom bɛdan ahobowdze: obiara a otwa mu wɔ ho no no ho bɔbow no
column3: na ɔabɔ no mu ayardɔm nyina ho nhwiroma."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ Sodom na Gomora na nkurow a wɔdeda ho no hɔn mbutuwii tse no
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse
column5: eso ɔdasanyi ne ba biara rennyɛ ɔmamforanyi wɔ hɔ."

column3: ɔbɔfow aba dɛ gyata fi Jordan ne ntsɛn no mu aba tsenabea a ɔyɛ dzen no do: na mebɛma oefi ne nkyɛn eguan awerɛfir mu; na obiara a wɔsan mu yi no no
column4: ɔnoara na medze no besi no do: na woana na ɔtse dɛ emi? Woana bɛhyɛ me ber? Woana nye oguanhwɛfo a obotum m’enyim gyina?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom ntsie EWURADZE n’apam a ɔrepam wɔ Edom ho; na ne tsirmpɔw a ɔabɔ wɔ Teman atsefo ho: Ampaara
column3: wobotwuw hɔn adze akɔ dɛ nguankuw mu nkakraba mpo; ampaara ɔbɛma hɔn tsenabea ayɛ amamfo aka hɔn ho."
asaase no popo; nkekamu heei wɔ hɔ a wɔtse ne nka wɔ Mbɛw Po no ho."
ɔbɔfow aba na oetu dɛ ɔkɔr
column4: na ɔatserɛw ne ntsaban mu wɔ Bozra do: na da no Edom mbarimba akatakyi hɔn akoma bɛyɛ dɛ ɔbaa a ɔroko awoo n’akoma."

column3: na Arpad; osiandɛ wɔatse nsɛmbɔn
column4: suro ekitsa hɔn: po do ayɛ begyabegya; wonntum nntaa dzinn."

column3: m’enyigye kurow no

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ne mberantsɛ bɔtotɔ wɔ n’abrɔn no mu
column3: na woetwitwa n’asambarimba nyinara egu wɔ da no mu

column2: "Na mobɔsɔ gya wɔ Damaskɔs fasu no mu
column3: na ɔahyew Ben-hadad n’ahemfi no."
na Hazor n’ahenman a Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar bɔɔ no no ho dze. Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Hom nsoɛr

column2: "Hom mfa hɔn asesee na hɔn nguankuw; hom nsoa hɔn ntwamuatam
column3: na hɔn ndzepa
column4: na hɔn efumpɔnkɔ mma hom ho: na hom ntseatsea mu dɛ

column3: hom nguan
column6: EWURADZE na ɔse. Osiandɛ Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar akɔ hom tsir do apam na ɔabɔ hom ho tsirmpɔw bi."

column3: hom nsoɛr nkɔ ɔman a hɔn ho adwe hɔn a wɔtse hɔ dwudwoodwo no do
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse; hɔn a wonnyi mbobotsen na adaban a hɔn nko ara na wɔtse no."

column3: na hɔn anantwi dodow ayɛ afonam: na mobɔbɔ hɔn a woetwitwa ntakuwa no ma apetse mframa nyina mu; na medze hɔn mbusu befi mbea nyina aba hɔn do
amamfo daa: ɔdasanyi biara renntsena hɔ
column4: eso ɔdasanyi ne ba biara rennyɛ ɔhɔho wɔ mu."

column2: "Iyi nye EWURADZE n’asɛm a ɔbaa nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia hɔ wɔ Elam ho wɔ Judahen Zedekia n’ahendzi ahyɛse no."
"Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Hwɛ
column3: mubobubu Elam egyen

column2: "Na medze mframa anan mibefi ɔsor mfɛndzanan maba Elam do
column3: na mabɔ hɔn apetse mframa anan no mu nyinara; na ɔman biara nnyi hɔ a Elam tokyemfo no wonnkodu hɔ."

column2: "Na mebɛma Elam hɔn akoma etu hɔn atamfo
column3: na hɔn a wɔrohwehwɛ hɔn nkwa no enyim: na medze mbusu mebɛba hɔn do
column5: EWURADZE na ɔse; na mebɛma afona etsiw hɔn ekodu dɛ mewie hɔn sa:"

column3: na masɛɛ ɔhen na mbapɔmba mefi hɔ

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ nda a odzi ekyir no mu no
column3: medze Elam befi ndɔmmum asan aba
